modName: Red Eagle Categorized Favorites Menu Config
summary: My personal configuration for Categorized Favorites Menu with support for many popular mods.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PCCel.png[/img]
My personal configuration for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url] by favmenumodder. It comes with support for all mods that I personally use, which will be in a list below. Currently the mod is designed to work with a resolution of 1680x1050.

Note: I haven\'t explored the entirety of SkyRe or even the vanilla game and Dawnguard, so there are sure to be errors! Please report an sorting errors/mistakes you find in the comments so that I can fix them!

FOUND AN ISSUE OR AN ERROR? REPORT IT IN THE COMMENTS SECTION!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Pd92ear.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ihEVU.png[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163]Frostfall[/url] by Chesko
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter is Coming[/url] by nivea
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892]Weapons of the Third Era (MoS Edition)[/url] by 747823 & masterofshadow
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]Bandoliers - Bags and Pouches[/url] by Dragten
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950]Convenient Horses[/url] by mitchalek
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8583]The Ashen Race - HD[/url] by Seren4XX
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286]Skyrim Redone[/url] by T3nd0
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14085]Faal Sizaan[/url] by Artisanx
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15109]Narquelion[/url] by Artisanx
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14693]Twister[/url] by Artisanx
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24342]Regal Assassin Armor[/url] by DreamBurrow
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5485]Deadly Combat[/url] by Borgut1337
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors[/url] collected by hothtrooper44
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644]Immersive Weapons[/url] collected by hothtrooper44
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16225]Apocalypse Spell Package[/url] by Enai Siaion
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10639]Imp\'s More Complex Needs[/url] by Imp of the Perverse

[img]http://i.imgur.com/wLooM.png[/img]
NMM:
Activate the mod in the Nexus Mod Manager.

Manual Installation:
Extract favoritesmenu.cfg to the Data\\Interface folder in your Skyrim directory.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/mntn6.png[/img]
NMM:
De-activate the mod in the Nexus Mod Manager.

Manual Installation:
Remove favoritesmenu.cfg from the Data\\Interface folder in your Skyrim directory.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eYFgs.png[/img]
Version 1.30
 - Added support for Dragonborn
 - Added support for Imp\'s More Complex Needs
 - Some other stuff I forgot
Version 1.20
 - Actually fix sorting for Elemental Fury
 - Fix sorting for Zephyr
 - Added support for Apocalypse Spell Package
 - Changes to No Hotkey List version
 - Change color of Survival sublist title to green
 - Updated SkyRe support to 0.99.23
 - Updated spacing and height lists to better make use of the space available
Version 1.11
 - More fixes for Dawnguard
 - Added version with replaced Hotkey list
 - Fixes sorting for Summon Arvak, Sun Fire, Aura Whisper, and Elemental Fury
Version 1.1
 - Fixed Vampire Lord for Dawngaurd
 - Added support for Immersive Armor
 - Added support for Immersive Weapons
Version 1.00
 - Initial Upload
 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uikGW.png[/img]
favmenumodder for making the Categorized Favorites Menu
DaemonAK for the idea of using separators in keyword lists
author: Shadow771

Fixes for sorting for Summon Arvak, Sun Fire, Aura Whisper, and Elemental Fury
